data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 5, Patric for the away team is judged to be offside.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Patric.
Betinho with an assist there.
In the minute 7, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 10, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Silva (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 18, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Gremio.
In Porto Alegre Recife PE attack through Patric. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, Gremio have a goal kick.
Recife PE are coming forward and Jonathan Gomez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 20, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 24, Everton for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 25, Free kick Recife PE.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Gremio's Luis Orejuela gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, Recife PE needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Recife PE will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gremio.
Lucas Silva (Gremio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 29, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Gremio throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Recife PE's Elton is on target but unsuccessful.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 37, Renato Gaucho is making the team's first substitution at Arena do Gremio with Jean Pyerre replacing Lucas Silva.
Gremio are pushing forward but Thiago Neves's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 39, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Gremio just outside Recife PE's area.
Gremio pushes forward through Jean Pyerre, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 40, Everton (Gremio) strikes at Arena do Gremio but his header is cleared.
Diego Souza is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Diego Souza for Gremio is back on the field again.
In the minute 42, In Porto Alegre, Thiago Neves (Gremio) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Thiago Neves of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Gremio are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Important block from the Recife PE defence as Jean Pyerre fires in a strike for Gremio.
In the minute 45, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade blows to end the first-half.
Luciano (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a second substitution, with Pepe replacing Bruno Cortez.
Lucas Mugni is replacing Jonathan Gomez for Recife PE at Arena do Gremio.
Attention is being given to Gremioâ€™s Matheus Henrique and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 48, Recife PE's Ronaldo has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Recife PE's Betinho has run offside.
Gremio drive forward but Everton is judged offside.
In the minute 50, Leandro Barcia is on a sub for Elton for Recife PE.
Matheus Henrique returns to the field for Gremio after picking up a slight injury.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 53, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
Gremio drives forward and Pepe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 54, Gremio's Diego Souza gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Gremio throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Marquinhos, who is grimacing with pain.
Recife PE's Marquinhos looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 64, Gremio's Jean Pyerre breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Isaque is replacing Thiago Neves for the home team.
In the minute 65, Gremio's Luis Orejuela misses with an attempt on goal.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Gremio's Pepe breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Recife PE at Arena do Gremio.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 71, Gremio's Jean Pyerre misses with an attempt on goal.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 72, Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Pedro Geromel gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Recife PE defence.
Recife PE have been given a penalty at Arena do Gremio...
Great finish from Iago Maidana to give Recife PE a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 76, Free kick Recife PE.
It seems as if Marquinhos is unable to continue. Lucas Venuto replaces him for the away team.
Gremio make their fourth substitution with Robinho replacing Alisson.
In the minute 78, Robinho for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Pepe strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 79, That's a fine assist from Robinho.
The away team have replaced Ronaldo with Marcao Silva. This is the fourth substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Isaque for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio are pushing forward but Jean Pyerre's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 84, Pepe (Gremio) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Gremio.
In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Isaque. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Luciano with Chico.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Arena do Gremio.
At Arena do Gremio the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Leandro Barcia (Recife PE) has received a first yellow card.
Betinho is booked for the away team.
